text: The person responsible for the off-boarding document must add the website link to it.
The person responsible for the off-boarding document must add details regarding hosting access and account transfers.
The person responsible for the off-boarding document must ensure all relevant account details, including Firebase, hosting, Gmail, Google Drive, and dashboard information, are included.
The person responsible for the off-boarding document must add a section for 'All Deliverable Submission Status'.
The person responsible for the off-boarding document must create an input box or designated space for adding notes or status updates.
The person working on the off-boarding process must create a separate feedback form.
The person working on the off-boarding process must share the feedback form (or its link/PNG format) by end of day.
The person working on the off-boarding process must prepare one more letter related to client communication.
The person working on the off-boarding process must complete the off-boarding document by Sunday.
The person responsible for the off-boarding document must encrypt it (PDF or Word) to require a password for opening.
The person managing the off-boarding document must send all access details and passwords to the manager by today evening.
The person managing the off-boarding document must structure the received access details and passwords and send them back by 9 or 10 PM tonight.
The person managing the off-boarding document must share the developer's work, including the project report and summary of work, with relevant parties.
The person managing the off-boarding document must share the message regarding the developer's work or requirements in the group chat.
The person managing the off-boarding document must copy the relevant information (developer's work/requirements) and send it to the manager.
The person managing the off-boarding document must create a new document with an open link, copying the relevant developer information.
The person managing the off-boarding document must add designated spaces or boxes for developers to add their work summary and outcomes.
The person managing the off-boarding document must share the document with an open link, ensuring it does not have restricted access.
The person managing the off-boarding document must create a table format within the document for easier data entry.
The person managing the off-boarding document must share the updated document (with the new table format) with the manager.
The person managing the off-boarding process must obtain updates from the developer regarding their completed work.
The developer must complete their assigned work and share it with the person managing the off-boarding document.
The person managing the off-boarding document must share the requirements or document with the developer.
The person managing the off-boarding process is responsible for overseeing developer updates and document sharing.
The quick meeting should be scheduled for 3 PM or later, after the 2 PM common meeting concludes.
